text: Shonda Rhimes'Scandal will come to an end next year, according to a report from TVLine. The series, which is part of ABC's popular T. G. I. T Thursday night lineup, has been a hit for the network and has helped secure Rhimes'dominance and make a big name out of star Kerry Washington, who plays Washington D. C.'s ` ` fixer'' Olivia Pope. This should not come as a huge surprise to big Shondaland fans, as Rhimes herself said that the show would have a shorter shelf life than her original hit, Grey's Anatomy, which is now in its 13th season. ` ` I feel like there is a finite amount of Scandal to be told,'' she told NPR in 2013
